did.abstract: Pulp and paper milling company based in Seattle, Wash. Dimensions 47 Simps-Un Lee brochure featuring J. Walter Thompson Company's 1968 outdoor, poster and print "Uncola" campaign for Seven-Up beverage. Campaign featured a number of contemporary commercial artists, including Barry Zaid, Bob Mitchell, Ed George, Jacqui Morgan, John Alcorn, John Craig, John Kurtz, Kim Whitesides, Milton Glaser, Nancy Martell, Pat Dypold, Roger Chouinard and Seymour Chwast. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
